articles.title: What Is Beyoncé’s Definitive Album? - The New York Times
articles.description: With the superstar’s seventh solo studio album, “Renaissance,” due Friday, our critics and reporters debate which work from her past reveals the most about her artistic vision.
articles.content: The music on I Am Sasha Fierce was divided in half: eight ballads where Beyoncé unfurled elegant, virtuosic vocals, and eight uptempos delivered with snarls and grit. Sasha Fierces arrival was cement… [+1918 chars]
